entry.title: WINTER STORM WATCH, Fisher Branch
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:31 a.m. CDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High zero.

entry.title: Tuesday night: Light snow and blowing snow. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Light snow and blowing snow beginning before morning. Wind becoming northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 before morning. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 5 this evening and minus 21 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CDT Tuesday 4 April 2023
